Module com.example.schedulejawn
Package controller

Class AddApptController

java.lang.Object
controller.AddApptController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddApptController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The class handles user interaction with addAppt.fxml. User input data through textfield, textarea, datepicker, and combobox.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      The method initializes the AddApptController. Data is set into the comboboxes. Datepicker is set to allow users to only pick from today onwards. User can only set a single day appointment. Appointments are set as 1hr intervals. Localdatetime and Zonedatetime (ET) available to user to check comparison when scheduling.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      resourceBundle -
      url -

    • clickedAdd

      public void clickedAdd(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      User input is retrieved, logically validated and inserted into database. Logical validation checks consist of no fields being null/empty, no appointment overlaps and appointment within business hours - 8am-10pm ET.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Add button is clicked

    • noOverlappedAppt

      public static boolean noOverlappedAppt(int customerId, int appointmentId, LocalDate selectedDateLD, LocalTime selectedStartTimeLT, LocalTime selectedEndTimeLT)
      Method determines if there is an existing appointment that would overlap the selected appointment datetime.

    • startWithinBusinessHour

      public static boolean startWithinBusinessHour(LocalDate selectedDateLD, LocalTime selectedTimeLT)
      Method used to determine if selected start localdatetime is within business hours.

    • endWithinBusinessHour

      public static boolean endWithinBusinessHour(LocalDate selectedDateLD, LocalTime selectedTimeLT)
      Method used to determine if selected end localdatetime is within business hours.

    • clickedCancel

      public void clickedCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Method cancels the add appt screen and returns to main screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - clicked cancel
      Throws:
      IOException

    • selectedAddApptStartDateDP

      public void selectedAddApptStartDateDP(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method sets the end date datepicker based on the start datepicker. User can only schedule appt as a day only appointment.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - a selection is made in the start date datepicker

    • selectedStartTimeCB

      public void selectedStartTimeCB(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method sets the end start time combobox based on the start time combobox. Time populates 1hr after the selected start hour. User can only schedule appointment at 1hr increment.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - a selection made in the start time combobox
